task.title: Enable the Livefyre Cloud Service for a Page

step.cmd: Create a new page or edit an existing page. For more information on how to create and edit a page, see Authoring Pages on docs.adobe.com
Choose Open Properties to open the Page Properties dialog.
If you do not see a Livefyre Cloud Service Configuration, click Add Configuration, then click Livefyre.
If you have more than one Livefyre Configuration, choose the one youâ€™d like to use for this page and its children.
Click the checkmark in the top-right corner of the dialog to save.

Enter Design Mode for the page to allow placement of Livefyre Components on the page. For more on how to use Design Mode for a page in AEM, see Configuring Components in Design Mode on docs.adobe.com.

In the Edit dialog window, scroll down in the Allowed Components section to find Livefyre. You can enable all components in the category, or any combination of individual components. for more information on how to enable or disable components in AEM, see Configuring Components in Design Mode on docs.adobe.com.
